name: Tower of Evolution
description:
You start as a primitive Monkey and have to climb the tower (floor by floor), evolving your character by consuming the rotating mutation blobs, bypassing enemys and traps (blobs are also spawnpoints, in case if you die).

In order to win the game, everyone has only one choice => There is no ESCAPE!

The game gets more challenging if you try to win this game with other characters than the wussy astronaut. This means you can't consume the blobs (no spawnpoints!).

Hint: Winning the game with the starting Monkey is the highest difficulty!
